specifications: Display: 1.2" LCD Screen Timer delay: 0s to 99hours 59min 59s in 1s increments Exposure time: 0s to 99hours 59min 59s in 1s increments Interval: 0s to 99hours 59min 59s in 1s increments Item weight: 105g Length of Cord: 80cm Power Supply: One 3V CR2032 battery (include) Model Compatible: Canon EOS 1100D(T3i), 600D(T2i), 60D, 550D (Digital Rebel T2i), 500D (Digital Rebel T1i), 1000D (Digital Rebel XS), 450D (Digital Rebel XSi), 400D (Digital Rebel XTi), 350D (Digital Rebel XT), 300D (Digital Rebel), Canon EOS 30, 33, 50, 50E, 300V, 300, 3000, Canon Powershot G10, G11, G12, G1X, Pentax K-5, K-7, K10D, K110D Super, K100D, K110D, K200, K20D, MZ-6, ZX-L,MZ-L, Contax N Digital, NX, N1, 645, Samsung GX 1L, GX 1S, GX-10 Color: Black
packagecontents: 1 x Timer Remote Controller Shutter Cord 1 x 3V CR2032 Battery 1 x User Manual
mainfeatures: Digitally accurate time controls via LCD display Delay, long exposure and interval time management functions The time can be preset from 1 second to 99 hours Settings are viewed on an LCD screen A dial enables you to easily enter numeric settings with a single thumb The LCD panel can be illuminated, can be illuminated in dark environments Multi photo numbering setting Mechanical shutter release mechanism works with or not with battery Low power consumption
